anonymInfo: All appointment confirmations and cancellations are presented anonymously
bookingNotPossible: Appointment booking not possible on this date. Please select an alternative date.
debugExcludeDates: Date is in vacations / free time
debugLastDayBooking: Time is after the last possible date for this day
debugLastMinuteBooking: Date too close to deadline (last minute)
debugPeriodRange: Date is outside the available date range
debugProblemsEnd: Problems occurred at the end of the appointment.
debugTotalEnd: Date is after the last possible booking date
debugTotalStart: Date is before the earliest possible booking date
debugWeekday: Weekday is not available for appointment booking
fillForm: Please fill out appointment booking form
formFillOut: Please fill in the form beforehand
maintance: We are currently performing maintenance on the calendar. Please try again at a later time.
privateSuccessHeader: Very good! The organizer has been informed about this new entry.
ratesAmount: {count} Total customer reviews | {count} Total customer reviews
saveError: Another person was faster and has already booked this appointment a few seconds ago. Please select another appointment. Your already entered data will be taken over.
saveLoader: Save ... Please do not close this page. Currently there are waiting times for data processing. It can take up to 1 minute until the appointment request is transmitted.
savedInfo: The appointment is now stored in the system and the appointment administrator has been informed about the appointment request.
savedLinkText: Show processing status and all appointment info
successAction: Please click the confirmation link in the email within the next {verifytime} . Only then will the appointment request be finally saved.
successHeader: One more step... Please confirm the desired date now.
successHint: A confirmation email will be sent to {email} in the next few minutes.
successSpamHint: If necessary, it is also worth checking the SPAM folder of the e-mail inbox in case the confirmation e-mail should have landed there by mistake.
targetPageInfo: Forwarding to further information in a few seconds
